Text:
dEAR SHEILA6:

I READ THE BOOK AND WATCHED THIS SERIES  WHEN THEY CAME OUT. NOW i DON'T REMEMBER A THING. 

BUT I REMEMBER ALL OF ATTENBOROUGH'S SERIES...RECENTLY I SAW HIS JAPANESE WATER GARDEN  ( OFFERRED BY NHK). REMEMBER ALL THE BLACK ADDER AND THINK BLUE LINE.  THIS FACT TELL ME SOMETHING

Many thanks Sheila.

The new film is good but this is better!
